mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groupGoal (startDate, endDate, groupID) VALUES (#{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{groupID})
mapper.select: SELECT GP.userID, GP.count, U.name, U.email, U.nickName FROM (SELECT UP.userID, COUNT(*) AS count FROM userProblem AS UP, groupUser AS GU WHERE GU.groupID = #{groupID} AND GU.userID = UP.userID AND UP.problemID IN (SELECT GP.problemID FROM groupProblem AS GP, groupGoal AS GG WHERE GG.groupID = #{groupID} AND GP.goalID = GG.id) GROUP BY userID) AS GP, user AS U WHERE GP.userID = U.id
